entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PGO Instrumented SDK fails to load coreclr.dll #95534
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete invalid overloads of `AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogicalRoundedNarrowingSaturate` family #95525
  • ambiguous call on 'OptionsBuilderExtensions' #95524
  • NativeAOT: Memset/Memcpy helpers don't throw NRE #95517
    Future
  • Connection reset by peer error when sending requests using HttpClient #95516
  • forgotten backport bugfix? #95508
  • certificate validation not working properly in .Net Android #95506
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization, turkish i does not behave like non-Hybrid #95503
  • ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory doc comments wrongly claim that the directory must not exist #95501
  • Print preview is not taking over the given print settings #95497
  • [wasm] Setting `maxParallelDownloads` sometimes has no effect #95491

Closed

  • When running .NET App via hostfxr, module initializers not called #95519
  • Docs and XML comments for Min/MaxMagnitude are incorrect #94500
    9.0.0
  • Wrong nuget package versions for Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks and Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Analyzers? #95204
  • build runtime faild Failed to build "CoreCLR component". #95449
  • ValidateOnStart API doesn't allow dependency loading when using IValidatableObject instead of IValidateOptions<IdentityServerOverridesOptions> #95400
  • httpclient need proxy for each request #95342
  • The character filter in HTTP StatusDescription is incorrect or there is a problem with the language pack. #95454
  • Publishing for linux-bionix-x64 using NativeAOT fails #95223
    9.0.0
  • ClientWebSocket memory footprint issue on Linux #71876
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Type.IsReferenceType` #90993
    Future
  • [mono] box+callvirt optimization incorrect when instructions are in different basic blocks #95347
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [ignore] testing xunitlogchecker #95533
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Per CMake docs, mark all RC-only DLLs and C++/CLI DLLs that do not export unmanaged symbols as `MODULE` libraries. #95532
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reporting of type loads via console output and a new event perfcounter #95531
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Always unroll GT_STORE_BLK for blocks with gc refs on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove workaround for closed issue #95529
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Fix GC regions virtual alloc after #80295 #95526
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Fix/cleanup the encoding/decoding of runtime invoke wrappers. #95523
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Switch HostApiInvokerApp to pre-built test asset #95521
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [QUIC] Use RemoteEndPoint host when TargetHost is missing #95518
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Cleanup some outdated helpers in libraries/Common #95515
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CL_3A to IF_SVE_CU_3A #95514
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Factor SSA's dominator tree computation #95507
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix missing symbols for mono-aot-cross #95505
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasm in release build #95502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][jit] Fix the bblock check in the box+callvirt optimization. #95500
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Avoid handing out duplicate `CORINFO_MODULE_STRUCT_*` handles #95499
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable EventSource tests #95498
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Error out if SelfContained is not specified for Native AOT publish #95496
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix comments of Min/MaxMagnitude{Number} #95495
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Make isRemovableJmpCandidate less restrictive on AMD64 #95493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rework the special instantiation type logic to be more effective #95490
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

Merged

  • Delete area-owners.json #95489
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Delete `ResourceLookup` in host tests #95522
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Revert "Fix missing symbols for mono-aot-cross" #95527
    area-Build-mono
  • Support VMR cross arch build #95425
    needs-area-label
  • Delete unused MEM_RESET flag from CoreCLR PAL #95520
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add X0 field init at capture context. #95470
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] If debugger is disconnected but vm is not exited restart the debugger thread #95270
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.x
  • Fix missing symbols for mono-aot-cross #95504
    area-Build-mono
  • Determine cross based on OS in addition to arch #95312
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix link in library-servicing.md #95509
    area-Meta
  • [mono][jit] Fix the bblock check in the box+callvirt optimization. #95443
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disabling mock test #95407
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.x
  • [wasi] Enable WasmEnableSIMD for wasi #95492
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • JIT: alt jit range #95283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve branch optimizer around implied relops #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added ARM64 SVE_GA_2A encoding #95435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [Mono][WIP] Try not fall back to interpreter for runtime invoke #95469
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update test runs to use Alpine 3.16 #95373
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [DataTable] Cache boolean result from BinaryNode.EvalBinary #95248
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • JIT: Force inline small BasicBlock methods #95484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] WS & HTTP clients more async #95483
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: removed unneeded throw helper blocks #95379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] eager allocation of Promise/Task result for async JSImport/JSExport #95411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • Wasm runtime features #95486
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Replace rsGetRsvdReg with ordinary temp registers #95317
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NO-MERGE] PR benchmark playground #95142
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
